segments.text: I am here to sign my escrow papers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will tell you ahead of time , that there is a lot to sign here , but I will help you every step of the way .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Should I have brought anything with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Basically , what I need from you now is your driver â€™ s license or some ID that shows your residency status .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will be going through these papers one by one . I will be explaining them all to you , and you can ask questions as we go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I make a phone call to a friend if I have a question ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We do not want you to sign any documents that you do not understand . You may get assistance with any questions that you have .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will the house be mine when we finish these documents ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is the last thing you need to do , but it may take a while for the papers to be processed .
segments.speaker: S2
